system.effect: When in contact with powered machine, battery, or power cell, make +10 Tech-Use check, on success reduce one level of fatigue, +1 for each Degree of success. Process takes 1 minute.

description.value: When in contact with powered machine, battery, or power cell, make +10 Tech-Use check, on success reduce one level of fatigue, +1 for each Degree of success. Process takes 1 minute.
